# userInfo

**Instance Property**

Optional, app-specific information that you can provide for use when your app performs the Home Screen dynamic mutable quick action.

## Declaration

```swift
var userInfo: [String : any NSSecureCoding]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The keys and values in this property’s dictionary must conform to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSecureCoding] protocol, and must be property-list-encodable. If they aren’t, the system raises a runtime exception when initializing the quick action. For information about property-list-encodable data, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/Archiving/Articles/serializing.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000952] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/Archiving/Archiving.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000047i] and see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization].

## Inspecting a Home Screen dynamic mutable quick action

- **localizedTitle**: The required, user-visible title for the Home Screen dynamic mutable quick action.
- **localizedSubtitle**: The optional, user-visible subtitle for the Home Screen dynamic mutable quick action.
- **type**: A required, app-specific string that you can employ to identify the type of quick action to perform.
- **icon**: The optional icon for the Home Screen dynamic mutable quick action.
